#!/bin/bash
#lesslinux provides ethtool #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
case $1 in start) ethtool='' ethwait=10 ethiface=eth0 for i in `cat /proc/cmdline` ; do case "$i" in ethtool=*) ethtool=`echo "$i" | awk -F '=' '{print $2}'` ;; ethwait=*) ethwait=`echo "$i" | awk -F '=' '{print $2}'` ;; ethiface=*) ethiface=`echo "$i" | awk -F '=' '{print $2}'` ;; esac done if [ -n "$ethtool" ] ; then printf "$bold===> Setting options on wired interfaces $normal\n" printf "$bold---> Waiting 5s for interfaces to settle $normal\n" sleep 5 ethjobs=` echo $ethtool | sed 's%|% %' ` ifaces=` echo $ethiface | sed 's%|% %' ` for j in $ethjobs ; do params='' [ "$j" = "autonegoff100full" ] && params="autoneg off speed 100 duplex full" [ "$j" = "autonegoff100half" ] && params="autoneg off speed 100 duplex half" [ "$j" = "autonegoff10full" ] && params="autoneg off speed 10 duplex full" [ "$j" = "autonegoff10half" ] && params="autoneg off speed 10 duplex half" for n in $ifaces ; do ethtool -s ${n} ${params} sleep 1 for m in ` seq 0 $ethwait ` ; do if ethtool ${n} | grep 'Auto-negotiation: off' ; then sleep 1 else printf "$bold+++> Still trying to set parameters for ${n} $normal\n" ethtool -s ${n} ${params} sleep 2 fi done printf "$bold---> Current state of interface ${n} $normal\n" ethtool ${n} done done fi ;; esac
